content: I'm thinking of setting a goal to save up for a new camera. I've been wanting one for a while now, and I think it would be a great investment for my hobby. I've been doing some research and found a model that I really like, and it costs around $800. I think it's a bit pricey, but I'm willing to save up for it. Can I set a goal to save $800 within the next 4 months?
